body.name: Storkcraft Maxwell Convertible Crib (White) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Converts to Toddler Bed and Daybed, Fits Standard Full-Size Crib Mattress, Classic Crib with Traditional Sleigh Design
features: 3-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed (not compatible with toddler guardrail), and daybed; Traditional sleigh design for classic nursery style; Assembly required

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress; This baby crib may be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35in (89cm)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood and engineered wood; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment; Backed by Storkcraft’s 1-year limited warranty

AWARD-WINNING BRAND: Exclusively from Storkcraft, proud recipient of the 2022 Women’s Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture and Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval for nursery and children’s furniture
body.description: Crafted with high-quality materials and in the beloved, timeless sleigh design, the Storkcraft Maxwell 3-in-1 Convertible Crib offers parents the best of both worlds: complete nursery functionality at unbeatable value. The Storkcraft Maxwell 3-in-1 Convertible Crib converts from a baby crib into a daybed and toddler bed. As a crib, the Maxwell includes an adjustable mattress support base with 3 height options - so it will adapt to your growing baby. When your baby is ready to graduate from the crib, the Maxwell easily and conveniently transforms into a daybed and toddler bed. The Maxwell was designed to fit any standard full-size crib and toddler bed mattress. Rigorously tested and crafted with care, the Storkcraft Maxwell meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards. Also, Storkcraft is the proud recipient of the 2020 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture. Crafted with love, passion, and care by Storkcraft - the longest-standing name in baby cribs, with over 75 years of experience in nursery and kids furniture. Compare Storkcraft's line of nursery furniture to Delta Children, Babyletto, Dream on Me, Million Dollar Baby, and Fisher Price.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storkcraft Maxwell 3-in-1 Convertible Crib Classic, timeless sleigh-style design at an unbeatable value. The Storkcraft Maxwell 3-in-1 Convertible Crib combines a traditional look with complete nursery functionality, as its able to transform from a baby crib into a daybed and toddler bed. Regardless of your budget, the Storkcraft Maxwell is the perfect choice to bring your family’s dream nursery to life.

Features Compatible with Toddler Safety Guardrail3-in-1 crib: Converts from baby crib into daybed and toddler bedSleigh-style design: A classic look with a traditional sleigh-style design, available in multiple non-toxic finishes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great crib and took me an hour to assemble, all by myself! Easy to follow instructions!There wasn't a nick or scratch on any parts of the crib. It was packaged professionally!I would definitely recommend this crib!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy with this crib for my baby on the way. The wood feels very smooth, some sort of coating on it. I like it, it feels nice to touch lol. The crib feels very sturdy. I put a lot of my weight on it.I definitely recommend putting this crib together with a partner. It would not be impossible alone, but there are some steps that require pieces to be held in place while another person screws.I paired the crib with the Ikea Malm 4-drawer chest, in white stained oak veneer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and clean design
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking crib for the price and pretty easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby To Toddler Bed
reviews.reviewText: Good quality bed. Not too expensive and not to hard to assemble. Hopefully the baby will get many years of good use out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Assembling was easy, is sturdy and not heavy at all. Only thing we highly disliked was the box came beat up , and one of the rails had a broken piece/splinter. Anything else was good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it n so does my granddaughter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Put together well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this crib for when I babysit my granddaughter. Since it will not be used a lot, naturally, I didn’t want to spend a lot of money. This crib is even better than I expected. It also had the appropriate certifications I wanted for safety reasons. It came without a scratch anywhere; and even though it took me a while to assemble it by myself I found it fairly easy. I would suggest that you attach the bottom of the bed to both ends of the bed before you put the front and back sections on the bed. Also, do not completely tighten any of the screws until it’s fully assembled Definitely worth the price and I highly recommend it.
I liked that it was reasonably priced, quick delivery, easy to assembly and it looks great in the babies room
